Title: Provides for a sex offender registry check for youth organization volunteers who have direct contact with youths under the age of 18
Summary: Provides for a sex offender registry check for youth organization volunteers who have direct contact with youths under the age of 18.
LawCode: Add ยง378-b, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to sex offender registry checks for youth organization volunteers
